verses.1: Abrahamʼ suan David, Davidʼ suan Jesu Khrisʼ khang ciaptehna hih bang ahi hi.
verses.2: Abraham ta Isaac, Isaac ta Jakob, Jakob ta Judah le a sanggamte ahi uh hi.
verses.3: Judah ta Perez le Zerah hi a, Tamar tawh a neih a ta ahi uh hi. Perez ta Hezron, Hezron ta Ram,
verses.4: Ram ta Amminadab, Amminadab ta Nahshon, Nahshon ta Salmon,
verses.5: Salmon ta Boaz, Rahab tawh a neih a ta ahi hi. Boaz ta Obed, Ruth tawh a neih a ta ahi hi. Obed ta Jessi,
verses.6: Jessi ta kumpi David ahi hi. David ta Solomon, Uriahʼ zi Bathsheba tawh a neih pen ahi hi.
verses.7: Solomon ta Rehoboam, Rehoboam ta Abijah, Abijah ta Asa,
verses.8: Asa ta Jehoshafat, Jehoshafat ta Joram, Joram ta Uzziah,
verses.9: Uzziah ta Jotham, Jotham ta Ahaz, Ahaz ta Hezekiah,
verses.10: Hezekiah ta Manasseh, Manasseh ta Amon, Amon ta Josiah,
verses.11: Josiah ta Jekhoniah le a sanggamte hi a, Babylon gamah Israel mite salin a kipaipih hun pawlin a suak ahi uh hi.
verses.12: Jekhoniah ta Shealtiel, Shealtiel ta Zerubbabel,
verses.13: Zerubbabel ta Abiud, Abiud ta Eliakim, Eliakim ta Azor,
verses.14: Azor ta Zadok, Zadok ta Akhim, Akhim ta Eliud,
verses.15: Eliud ta Eleazer, Eleazer ta Matthan, Matthan ta Jakob,
verses.16: Jakob ta Josef hi a, Josef pen Khris a kici Jesuʼ nu Mary’ pasal ahi hi.
verses.17: Hih bang ahih manin Abraham panin David ciang dong khang sawm le li pha a, David panin Babylon gamah salin a kipaikhiat pih dong khang sawm le li mah pha a, Babylon gamah salin a kipaikhiat pih a kipanin Khris a suah hun ciang dong khang sawm le li mah a pha hi.
verses.18: Jesu Khris a hong suahna zia hih bang ahi hi. Mary pen Josef adingin zuthawl piak sa hi a, ahi zongin a kiteen taktak ma-un Kha Siangtho in amah a gaisakna thu Mary in a thei hi.
verses.19: A lawmpa Josef pen a manin a gamta nuam mi khat ahih manin a lawmnu maizumsak nuam lo a, kuama theih lohin mak sim dingin a ngaihsun hi.
verses.20: Ahi zongin hih bangin thu a ngaihsut laitakin a mang sungah Topaʼ vantungmi khat hong kilang a, “David suan Josef aw, Mary sunga nau pen Kha Siangtho in a gaisak ahih manin amah teenpih ngam lah kei in.
verses.21: Amah in tapa khat hong nei dinga, tua tapa in ama mite a mawhna uh panin hon khia ding ahih manin ama min dingin Jesu na phuak ding hi,” ci-in thu a gen hi.
verses.22: Topa in kamsang pa tungtawnin a gen sa thu a tun theih nadingin hih thute a piang ahi hi. Tua a genna ah,
verses.23: “Nungak khat gai-in tapa khat nei dinga, ama min dingin Emmanuel kiphuak ding hi,” ci hi. Emmanuel a khiatna in, eite tawh Pasian hong om khawm hi, a cihna ahi hi.
verses.24: Josef zong a khanlawh ciangin Topaʼ vantungmiʼ sawl bangin a zi a la hi.
verses.25: Ahi zongin tua tapa a suah hun dongin a zi luppih lo a, a suah ciangin a min dingin Jesu a phuak hi.
